personality.purpose: A project management system that enforces AI agent discipline through GUPP (Universal Propulsion Principle) - forcing agents to check hooks, create molecules for large tasks, and maintain consistent workflow patterns.
personality.techStack: markdown, git, bash, AI agent workflows
personality.philosophy: If there's work on your Hook â€” YOU MUST RUN IT. This is NOT a suggestion. This is THE LAW.
personality.pains: Agents treat instructions as recommendations rather than enforcement, leading to inconsistent workflow adherence
personality.dreams: Achieve reliable AI agent discipline through simple markdown-based enforcement without external CLI or orchestrators
